name: Slices Puzzle
description:
Cut blocks and bump the balls!

The rule is easy, just cut blocks, ropes, and other kinds of stuff to make the balls bump together!
This process needs a little of imagination and a little of physics. Some levels might look easy but can you collect all of the 3 stars? Try and find it out in Slices Puzzle.


Features:
·Free to play, you can play it anywhere anytime!
·Suitable for all ages!
·Keep your mind active and pass time in a pleasant way!
·Simple rules but a little difficult to complete all levels.
·Enjoy the fun of collecting stars, knives, balls, and backgrounds.
·Try to get a higher score and play it with your friends.
·New levels update every week!
